remarks: A lattice element greater than zero is nonzero.  TODO: is this needed? (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2012.)
statement:
opltne0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
opltne0.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
opltne0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
opltn0 $p |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B ) -> ( .0. .< X <-> X =/= .0. ) ) $.
